alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Somerset County through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrabassett Valley, or 15 miles east of Eustis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bingham, Carrabassett Valley, Brighton Plantation, Caratunk Plantation, Dead River, Carrying Place, Moscow, Pleasant Ridge Plantation, Highland Plantation, Bald Mountain, Pierce Pond, East Moxie, Mayfield, Concord and The Forks Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
